name: Survivor Island (itch) (ambi)
description:
Time running out. Maybe bit more than I can chew.

Features implemented:

  • Basic movement
  • Basic enemy chase
  • Death and reload level
  • Fully procedural level creation
  • Nice autotiled pixel art terrain

Features missing:

  • Player weapons
  • Pathfinding
  • Shadows and fog of war
  • Music and most of audio
